verse.lines: {lang-eng}Oh! what joy to trust Thee, Jesus, Mighty Victor o’er the grave, And to learn amid earth’s shadows Thine unceasing power to save! Only those who prove Thee know What the grace Thou dost bestow.{/lang-eng}
